mapper.select: select pro_num, cate_code, pro_name, pro_rentalprice, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_content, pro_upfolder, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy, pro_date, pro_updatedate from product_tbl where cate_code=#{cate_code} and pro_buy = 'Y'

select pro_num, cate_code, pro_name, pro_rentalprice, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_content, pro_upfolder, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy, pro_date, pro_updatedate, pro_review from product_tbl where pro_num = #{pro_num}
